changes: The Slider component now uses rem for its font size to responsively adjust to the user's font size browser preferences.
Moved the label for the Slider with input(s) up to match the designs in Figma.
Padding was added over the Slider with input(s) to prevent the label from overflowing.
fixes: The change impacts the total height of the Slider with input(s) and other compact input elements from the Elvia design system. Ensure to adjust the spacing and/or alignment in your design to account for the larger size of all compact input elements.
